Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.abstract: Key-based subscription to get element by it’s key in a case of dictionary element type.

Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.name: string
Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.abstract: Obtain string value of the object if element is string or could be casted to string.

Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.name: integer
Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.abstract: Obtain integer value of the object if possible(can be converted from number or string).

Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.name: double
Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.abstract: Obtain double value of the object if possible(can be converted from number or string).

Protocols/RM_ParsableElementType.html#/s.name: bool
